CharacterClass.name: Cleric
CharacterClass.description: Cleric: Turn undead, cast divine spells

CharacterClass.name: Fighter
CharacterClass.description: Fighter: percentile strength, heavy armor, any weapon, lots of health

CharacterClass.name: Monk
CharacterClass.description: Monk: Good with hand to hand combat

CharacterClass.name: Paladin
CharacterClass.description: Paladin: protection from evil 10', immune to disease, cure disease once a week, lay on hands to heal 2*Level health once per day

CharacterClass.name: Ranger
CharacterClass.description: Fighter: percentile strength, heavy armor, any weapon, lots of health
